long_description: Catch some shut-eye with REI Travel Blanket. It comes in its own mesh stuff sack so it's easy to take along. And, because it's absorbent and fast-drying, it does double-duty as an outdoor towel. Polyester microfiber fabric has a smooth, ultra-suede finish so it's remarkably absorbent and quick dryiing. Rolls up into the included mesh stuff sack.
short_description: Catch some shut-eye with REI Travel Blanket. It comes in its own mesh stuff sack so it's easy to take along. And, because it's absorbent and fast-drying, it does double-duty as an outdoor towel.
